speaker: Agent
text: Hi, this is Linda from ABC Collections. Am I speaking with Mark?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Mark. Who's calling?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling about your overdue account. Honestly, I'm fed up with this fuckery. Can you verify your address for me?

speaker: Customer
text: My address is 123 Elm Street, Springfield.

speaker: Agent
text: Thanks, Mark. You have a balance of $310 due. When can I expect a payment?

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, I'll follow up later. Don't let this shit slide again.
